overview:
StivaSoft is a global IT leader providing professional website design, high quality application development and outsourcing services to individuals and companies of all sizes. StivaSoft is a web-development company that’s been specializing in custom programming since 2003. The company stays behind the brands PHPjabbers, Ezy, Brolmo and Stiva.

The story of StivaSoft began when the founder and current CEO, Veselin Stoilov, teamed up with two graduate school buddies – Sasho Valkanov and Kosta Todorov – to launch a small website called PHPJabbers. The initial offering consisted of a few “off-the-shelf” web applications. Through intense efforts, the company quickly expanded to offer:

• Advanced Web Development • Custom Enterprise Solutions • Web Design and Development • Mobile Application Development • Cloud Computing and Vertical Markets Solutions

StivaSoft offers vertical market solutions for different sectors and business needs: Fitness and Health, Hotel Management, Online Car Dealers, Driving Instructors, and many more…

Since 2003, StivaSoft has been trusted to provide companies with competitive advantages in almost all sectors and industries. See our full range of services and products at http://www.stivasoft.com/

Since the begining our team has grown from three friends to over 20 professionals occupying three offices on two continents, and over 20,000 clients across the globe.

Veselin Stoilov, CEO of StivaSoft,  earned a Bachelor Degree in Information Technology from the University of Economics, Varna.  Veselin Stoilov developed a number of web applications and programs which resulted in his own company.
